about_the_game:
AIKODE (or AI-KODE) is an immersive action role-playing game solo developed by ACE.

Featuring colossal bosses and intricate combat mechanics, players can explore a vast world filled with diverse cities, ranging from a cyberpunk metropolis to steampunk-themed towns and even a faithful replica of Tokyo. Get ready to traverse this expansive world on foot, on a motorcycle, or even take to the skies with your own wings. With hundreds of NPCs whose behaviors vary every day, an extensive relationship system, and different timelines, AIKODE offers a fully-realized world where players can customize characters' clothing and hairstyle, play arcade games, decorate your home, cook, fish, and engage in a myriad of activities.

Everything is possible in AIKODE... except finding the truth.

"Seven days ago, you were born into a world that appears irrevocably fragmented, and doomed to repeat itself in an endless cycle of death. Yet, there may be a way to break free from this grim fate - a child, a puppet, a contract.

Just be aware... they say that those who sign the contract are doomed..."


⩥ Colossal bosses and intricate combat mechanics:


Prepare for epic battles against giant creatures and hordes of enemies with a versatile weapon that can switch between three modes: gun, sword, and scythe. Master the intricacies of combat to find the truth in this fragmented world.

⩥ A vast and immersive world:


Explore a richly detailed world filled with diverse cities and landscapes, each with their own unique atmosphere and culture. From the neon-lit streets of a cyberpunk metropolis to the steampunk-themed towns of the countryside, and even a faithful replica of Tokyo, the world is yours to discover.

⩥ Multiple exploration methods:


Get ready to traverse this expansive world using a variety of methods, whether on foot, on a motorcycle, or even with your own wings. Take to the skies and soar over the mountains, ride your motorcycle through the deserts, or hike through the forests and valleys. Whatever your preferred method, there's always something new to discover.

⩥ An extensive customization system:


Personalize your character with a wide range of hairstyles and clothes to choose from, with over 200 options available. Mix and match different combinations to create a truly unique look that reflects your indentity.

⩥ Your free time, your life:


Take a break from the battles and spend your free time doing what you enjoy. Decorate your home, go fishing, visit arcades and karaoke bars, or work on building relationships with your colleagues and friends. The choice is yours, and how you spend your time may have an impact on the game's story and characters.

⩥ Butterfly Rail System:


What exactly is an identity? Well, to put it in simple terms, you could think of it as a dataset containing unique characteristics that define an individual. It's almost like data in that sense. Does that make sense to you? it should.... it should.... make sense...Oops, my bad! I bet you were expecting me to spill the beans on another game characteristic. No need to fret, though! You can keep on reading without any interruptions.

content_descriptors.notes:
AIKODE features strong language, intense violence, blood, and gore.

It also offers optional sexual content that can be disabled at any time from the game menu. It's worth noting that this option doesn't affect the game's storyline, and players can fully complete the game without enabling any sexual content.

  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 (3.3GHz) / AMD FX™-6100 (3.3GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon™ R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum system requirements are yet to be known.

short_description: In Somnium, a world doomed to an endless cycle of death, Aiko, a Kyao created by "The Order", comes across a puppet that will lead her to the worst of futures - her own past.
